summary: Amanda is a corporate highflier who needs a slacker so she can have a baby and keep her career.
cast: Fiona Gillies|Tom Conti|Geoffrey Streatfeild|Adrian Lukis|Matilda Ziegler|Richard Lumsden|Richard Bremmer|Colin Stinton|Christopher Ryan|Stephen Bent|Simon Lowe|Will Barton|Daniel Hill|Harriet Thorpe|Alexis Peterman|Candida Gubbins|Louise George|Michael Benz|Tom Golding|Jeremy Hill|John Lanasis|Jason May|Dar Dash|Kingsley Ben-Adir|Oliver Fabian|Josh Hart|Ross Boyask|Kae Alexander|Derek Allassani|Mia Jenkins|Rona Morison|Sophie Walde|Rufus White|Stephen Wilson
title: City Slacker
